attributes.action: Stop the Government from Cancelling the May 2025 Local Elections.
attributes.additional_details: We live in a democratic country. Cancelling or delaying local elections is an infringement of our democratic rights.
attributes.background: Allow all local elections to go ahead in May 2025.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Do not postpone the local elections

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
